144123.content:
The giant metallic fork soon approached the vast cavern of the boy’s mouth. Through your sticky chains, you could see his perfectly-brushed teeth coated in a shiny layer of saliva. The older boy had just went through a hard training hour at the ballpark. He were too focus on his delicious meal to see the tiny bug wiggling on his dish. Your struggling attempt was futile, as he quickly put the fork in his mouth, cleaned away any piece of food on the fork, including you. The gigantic blocks that was his teeth began to chomp on you, while the gigantic red tongue lashed chaotically, pushing any piece of un-chewed food into the range of his teeth while also mixing his food with sticky saliva and well, tasted his food for him. Lucky for you, everything in your tiny perspective was moving slower, so you could evade those deadly bites and chews of him. In a moment, while you were jumping around, you were hit by his tongue and trapped under it. Your face stayed next to his saliva gland, and it kept spitting his stinky slimy saliva in all over your face, some even got into your nose and mouth and made you gagged violently. Luckily, the tongue lashed away again, allowed you to escape from the saliva water gun. In mere seconds, the piece of hash brown, the melted cheese and the egg were chewed up into a big mushy mess gathered in the middle of his red lumpy tongue. He was giving a last taste of his delicious lunch. Then the gigantic tongue lifted up to the hard pinkish ceiling of his mouth, before pushing anything on its surface down the black abyssal hole that was his throat.
Outside, the 14-year-old player, named Alfred, was having the most refreshing moment of his afternoon. He’d passed a hard test in his school (he had learnt his lessons before but still felt stressful in the test). Then he had to go to a practice with his team for the big game next weekend, in an empty stomach. Alfred was the ace of the team, but still a normal boy after all, and an athletic boy like him need to be fed well. So he got on his bicycle and raced to Waffle House as soon as possible, right after the practice ended, and made an order immediately, not even bother to take a rest and wipe out all the sweat on his forehead. He had the urge to eat their delicious hash brown with melted cheese topping. As soon as his meal was brought out, he ate it voraciously, like it was the first and the best meal he had ever had. He squeezed the whole hash brown in his mouth, completely ignored every existed table manner. Al made an audible “GLURP” as he swallow his mouthful of food, creating a big bulge that could be seen slowly travel down his stomach. He swore he could hear the plop sound when it dropped down his big belly. Alfred gave it a gentle pad, then drank some coke and order one more dish of waffle with hot butter. The hash brown could hardly filled his hungry belly. “Looks like I’m gonna spent all of my lunch money now! No matter! FOOD IS FOOD!” Alfred happily said to himself, and then continued to indulge himself with the waffle. He had never notice the tiny human trapped in his stomach, during his massive feeding frenzy.
The esophagus wasn’t a very comfortable place to spend some time in. Everything was cramped and hot like your room during that summer slumber party (you would prefer not remembering or mentioning about that event). The muscle kept squeezing you and the food and pulled you down, extinguished every attempt to climb back of you. But at least the peristalsis of the muscle was comfortable to you, like a big massage blanket, if that thing ever exists. And when you went pass the section near his heart and lungs, you could hear the fast beating of his heart, and the hollow sound of air entering and exiting his lungs. It was so relaxing in a weird, weird sense of weirdness. Then everything changed when that cursed wrinkly sphincter opened, and dropped you into the organic hell that was his stomach. The air was hotter than a hot Sunday morning in Arizona (you’d been there before to visit your cousins before), and smelled like someone had burnt the acid shelf in your school’s lab, then had a panic attack and vomited all over the place (you had also been in that situation before, and you would also prefer not remembering or mentioning that event). And everything kept shaking and gurgling like some kind of demonic milkshake. You were currently swimming in a marsh, formed from the mush that used to be a beautiful hash brown topped with a sunny side egg and melted cheese, softened with a small rain of Coca Cola. “THIS GUY IS INSANE! He finished his meal in one go and chewed everything to mush! How big is his mouth and throat? ” You tried to find any floating debris left, but there were nothing. You could then see a weird, greenish liquid started seeping out from the wrinkly wall of the pink gigantic belly. He was trying to digest you. “NO! NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO!” you began to panic. A drop of acid drop on your bare shoulder, and you gave the louder scream you had ever, ever had. You knew this would be your end and began to count the time to your demise. “1…2…3…4…5……149…150....Wait! I’m still alive! YEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!” you screamed again, even louder than before. But right before you could gave yourself a party and sing “We are the champion” (that old song that your teammates sing every time he won you in a card game match), that cursed sphincter open, and more globs of chewed food rained down like a rain of meteor. The soft mushy boulder began to create waves and waves of mushy stuff, gave you a serious case of headache and dizziness. Then the foul air began to gather, before explode out of the tiny hole and created an “UUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP” explosion that trembled the entire tummy and nearly knocked the consciousness out of your fragile 8 years old body, and temporary deafened you for half a minute. “HE STILL EATING, AFTER HAVING EATEN THAT MANY STUFF? WHAT A FREAKING MONSTER!!!!!” you loudly exclaimed and promised yourself that you would never, ever sit near this guy in any place that has food in your entire life. He would devour you whole (well, he already did). The pink, organic and noisy prison of your began to recover after that tremendous burp, and began to shake its walls to digest the mush. Then suddenly, it trembled violently again. He must had finished his meals, and was now heading home. The trembling last for 15 minutes, under which his busy stomach still working hard on doing its duty to digest his inhuman-size lunch, before stopped. Then everything was like flipped 90 degree horizontally. Alfred was laying on his bed at that time, and was taking a nap, conserving his energy for the next practice at 16:30, or 4:30pm. With anything stayed at the back side of the stomach (currently the bottom as he was laying down), you could see another bigger sphincter at the end of the tummy. You had leant and read too many books about human anatomy to know where that puckered thing lead to. You had two choices: either crawled out through his esophagus and out of his mouth with the risk of fighting its incredibly strong peristalsis movement, or through the way of nature with the risk of having your dignity, your honor, your spirit and your sense of smell completely destroyed. Choose your poison.

It wasn't easy do to your small stature but you finally pushed through. You then grab onto the walls of his throat and start to climb. The peristalsis made it really hard to get back up. You made it halfway and decided to take a break. As you were taking your break something happens...

14412311.content: If anyone had ever thought that climbing and crawling inside a tube was easy they obviously had never tried that kind of smooth, slimy tube that could push you down anytime it felt like it. And the esophagus, of more specifically, this boy’s esophagus, was that kind of tube. Even though he was laying horizontally on his bed, which made it a little bit easier for you to climb, as the food pipe was nearly horizontal, it was still difficult as hell. Every little inch you made toward the mouth, it pushed you back one and a half inches. It took you 15 minutes just to get past the sphincter that was tightly sealing his stomach, and another 15 minutes just to get to the middle of his esophagus. Having constantly fight against the peristalsis wave for a long time, you was tired. You tried to crawl to his epiglottis, the thing that shield his windpipe from unwanted pieces of food. He had rolled to sleep on his right side while you were still on your journey (surprisingly didn’t cause more trouble for you), so you could have a good view of his still-developed white pair of vocal cords while staying at the back section of his throat, near your exit. His breath wasn’t very smelly, so you tried to use his warm breath to dry your acid-and-saliva-soaking clothes. Then you took a small rest. Suddenly, a loud rumbling sound surprised you. It came from his stomach. You had heard this sound before. You knew what would happen. And it was not good. Then the enormous gale of foul gas rushed out from his stomach through his throat, carried you along with it stinky wind, then blast out of the young teen’s mouth and created an even louder “UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP” than before. The foul explosion blasted you miles and miles away (actually just a few dozen centimeters) and you landed on the white surface of his uniform-clad chest. “Jeez! After all that time, this guy can still make another burp! Truly a monster indeed!” you exclaimed, tried to stand on your legs. You made an observation of his room. It was just like any typical teenage bedroom, with messy notes and pens on his desk, discarded dirty clothes everywhere, and some old pizza boxes that probably had grown its own ecosystem. Lucky for you, the door wasn’t completely blocked your way, as it had a small gap between itself and the floor, which would totally fit you. The windows wasn’t totally closed either. It was still slightly opened, and you could feel the harsh sunlight, as well as the cool breeze of summer blowing through the opening. He must be on the second floor of the house. You saw a bunch of cups at a corner of his room. Baseball cups. You took another look to the jersey hanging on the wall above those cups. Number 25, Johnsons. You knew this guy. His full name was Alfred Fredrick Johnsons, mostly called Al, and he was the baseball champion of your brother’s high school. You had met him many times before, mainly at Waffle House and the ballpark, usually with his teammates or his two younger brothers, one of them was your classmate. He was a nice guy who loves his brothers very much and a good student and a great player who was loved, as well as deeply respected by his teammates, friends and teachers, although he was little bit lazy (his room was a solid prove). He was also an eating monster, and he was that guy who could eat a 10 tons of food and still be able to keep a perfectly fitted and athletic body (which made you and lots and lots of other people jealous). You once saw him threaten to hit a teammate in the head with his bat, just because that teammates stole one of his waffle. Your tummy began to rumble just by thinking about that event. You hadn’t eaten anything since this morning, beside a donut that was bitten a half by one of your brothers, and just a mere memory of a waffle made your stomach felt hungry. You could smell a delicious smell, the smell of a freshly baked apple pie through that tiny gap of the door, further enhanced your hunger. His mother was a 5-star ranked baker, and you would do anything just to get a bite of her delicious pies (please don’t think of anything sexual, he was still a kid for peace’s sake!). Your hunger and your urge to escape started to have a fight in your head. On one side, you wanted to get out of this place. On the other side, you wanted to get to the kitchen and had a proper breakfast (or a lunch) after all that time. Should you follow your mind and escaped through the window, with the risk of not knowing where you would land, and a high chance of being blown away by the wind with you grain-sized body. Or should you follow your stomach and get through the door, with a high chance of being captured again? If you stayed here for too long, he may woke up and endangered your already slim chance of getting away. Make your choice. Will it be your freedom, or your hunger? Will it be the cool refreshing wind of summer (and FREEDOM), or that delicious, freshly-baked apple pie?
14412311.title: He burps

You landed in a nearby boy's food.
You land on the ledge of the kitchen window
144123111.content:
“Nah! My priority is to get out of here as soon as possible! Sorry apple pie!” you said to yourself. Your hunger was strong, and the apple pie was very tempting, but the call of freedom was stronger. If you risk taking that apple pie, that may be the last piece of pie you had. Beside, your mother was a good baker, and nothing could top her delicious chocolate tiramisu. May be after all this mess is finish, you could made one with her, like you used to do when you was younger. “ARGH! All that thinking about food make me hungry! I must get out of here! Fast!” you said. You observed the room carefully for one more time, tried to find the shortest way to the window. Alfred’s blanket was haft-falling, hanging near the floor, as a result of his sleep-kicking (that was when you were still trapped inside his tummy), made it a perfect way to get to the ground. One of his bats was leaning on his desk, which lied directly below the window. “That’s it! I’m gonna climb down the bed sheet and run to the bat. Then I’ll climb it and get to my freedom!” you cheerfully said and began to make your way on his gigantic body.

You were walking on Alfred’s left chest. The ground you were on kept rising up and down with every breath he made, which made it a little difficult for you. His heart was so strong that you could feel its mighty beats and its “thump thump” sound. It was somehow relaxing, at least compare to the noisy hell that was his belly. The ground wasn’t as soft as you though it would be. Well, Al was an athlete, and was very focus on training his body for maximum efficiency and more chance to win the game. His body was very well-built, not the kind of ultra-muscular build, but the lean, athletic type of muscular build that was suitable for an ace batter like him. You took a look at his mile-long left arm. His arms was quite muscular for a young teen like him, and from your perspective, it was a gigantic mountain range made of flesh and bones that stretch out to the edge of white desert of cotton bed sheet. The sleeve of his jersey was a little bit short (it was an old jersey that Alfred really like), allowed you to have a peek at his armpit. It had begun to grow some tiny strand of black hairs, like a newly-grown field of black grass. You remembered hearing from your 16-year-old brother that when boys entered a special stage at about 13, they would begin to grow hair at many places on the body. The thought of having a hairy armpit and a hairy crotch like your brother (you saw when he was walking to his room while naked. He was a weird person!) creeped you out. You regained you focus and got back to your journey. The ground was much softer when you arrived at his flat tummy, but still quite tough compare to yours. You could still hear the gurgling sound that the stomach made. And suddenly, you could hear a different sound, like someone was flushing a toilet filled with vomit. His tummy must have finished it duty of digesting Alfred’s breakfast (which was also his lunch), and was pushing the digested food into his gut. It was a good thing that you had escaped from that hellish place. You knew the fate of those hash browns, where they would end up inside. You wouldn’t want to have that fate to be someone’s poop. You walked past his exposed navel (Alfred was scratching his belly while you were struggling inside his throat, and his old jersey was a little bit shorter and tighter, too, making his belly button exposed), which was like a humongous dried-out lake compare to your minuscule size. It had some cotton lint inside, and there were a faint line of short hair strands that lead to his, well, underwear. You made your way through the exposed skin of his belly, tried to avoid the “other” way as far as possible. Standing on his hip, you made a jump down to the part where his blanket was nearly fell of the bed. You slowly climbed down the soft cotton surface, then ran like a maniac through the wooden floor of his room to the bat, and climbed like a monkey. All of the running and climbing took you nearly an hour and a half, not counting the trekking on Al’s body. You were somehow shrunk even smaller after staying inside of his stomach, which made things more difficult. You took a rest on his desk when you had finished climbing his precious bat, and was panting like your aunt’s dog after he played fetch for an hour. You took a look at the clock. It was 4 p.m. already. Thirty minutes more and Alfred would wake up for his practice, and greatly reduce your chance to escape. “I must hurry! If he woke up, I might be caught or trapped in this place again!” You said as you moved your aching legs, tried to get to the window. You made on time, despite having exhausted from running and climbing. The moment you finally got on the window frame, a loud alarm sound rang, and woke Alfred up from his short slumber. “GOOD BYE ALFRED!!!!!! HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELLO FREEDOM!” you yelled and jumped out of the window, let the cool summer winds carried you through the air. Will the wind of Zephyrus be merciful and brought you to your safety, or will Zephyrus be cruel and send you to another misery?
144123111.title: A true American must follow the call of FREEDOM...

choices: He coughs you out on the way to David's house.
He gets to David's house without making any coughs.
He coughs you out onto the chocolate bar
1441231111.content:
You were enjoying your flight with the wind! Your size was even reduced more, about half the size of a tiny ant (about 1 or 2 millimeters, or approximately 1/30 inch). But that made your ride much better. Everything felt so awesome, like you were riding an invisible mighty eagle and soaring through the air. You closed your eyes, enjoying the coolness of the summer breeze and the joy of having been freed from all your problems (except the shrinking part). It was so much fun. But while you were still drowning in the happiness of your freedom, you didn’t noticed that the wind was getting weaker and weaker, and you was falling slowly. In about 3 minutes, the altitude of your flight was lowered from nearly 30 feet in the sky to about 5 feet and a quarter from the ground. “Hey! What wrong? I am getting lower!” you wondered. Suddenly, an image of gigantic figure filled your teeny tiny eyeballs as soon as they opened. It was a face. A huge, huge, huge face of a boy. “NO NO NO NO NO NO! NOT THIS AGAIN!” you scream. You tried to change the course by swinging or squeezing your arms close to your body, like those glider guys you saw on T.V. But it was too late. There was nothing you could do to avoid him as he was walking closer and closer to you. The size of his face was like a mini moon. Then you began to realize something. You were flying closer and closer to his hill-sized nose. You could see the two gigantic caves that was his nostrils. Suddenly, the air was pulled down violently and formed a strong current (for a tiny like you, that air current was powerful) that were heading to one of his nostril. You were caught in his breath. He was going to inhaled you. And before you could do anything to escape, you were sucked in, along with a part the breeze that had carried you out. You tried to hold onto a strand of his nose hair, and anchored you in his nostril. Then the wind stopped for a moment, before another hotter and more humid gale of wind blew out. The cycle kept repeating as the boy was breathing outside. “WHY IS THIS HAPPENING TO ME!!!!!” you yelled in panic. But suddenly, the wind stopped again. You could heard the loud voice of the boy. He was speaking about something. Then suddenly, another air current ran into his nasal cavity. This current was much stronger. You appearance inside his nose must had made his felt itchy. But instead of using his finger, he decided to take you in by taking a deep breath. You felt like you were in a hurricane. You desperately tried to hold onto his nose hair, but things just got worse as you felt you were moving further inside. The snot sticking on the strand of hair acted as some kind of slippery oil and were making your hands slipped away. After exactly 1 second of fighting again the storm (that was an impressive feat for a dust like you), you gave up as your hands slipped away, and your body was flung into the dark abyss.
Aaron was walking home from the playground. The eleven-year-old just had the best day of his life when he won four consecutive matches of Pokemon as a challenge against 2 other kids in the class next to his. He was praised like a hero by his friends, who lost some cards to those two, and one of the guys even gave him a big bar of chocolate as a gift. He also won 2 rare Pokemon cards from the challenge as his reward, and took back the cards of his friends. As he was still having flash back about the game while walking, a sudden itch interrupted him. Something tiny just had got stuck inside his nose. “Must be dust! The weather is a little windy today.” He didn’t want to use his finger, as the itch wasn’t very annoying. And he also didn’t want the rare cards he was holding to get dirty by his snot and booger. So he decided to take a deep breath, hoping that the slight itch would gone. Feeling that the itchy feeling had subsided, he started to breath normally again, and continue his stroll. But then he stopped for a moment. “Wait! It still too soon to go home! I need to tell David about this! He’s going to be sooooooooooo excited when he see these cards! And maybe I can exchange these for one of his toys! Oh boys he’s gonna trade anything for a rare card! He’s gonna be on cloud nine about these!” he thought. And with that plan in his mind, Aaron changed his way to David’s house, excited to show him his “heroic” feat, and maybe trade some of his toys. He’d already targeted on David’s fancy Lego Castle set that he brought to class once, and he knew his best friend too well. That dude would do almost anything just to add some rare Pokemon cards to his massive collection of ten thick card albums, all of which were nearly filled with Pokemon cards and some random cards from other games he had been collecting since he was 5. “This is going to end well! Very well!” Aaron said as he happily skipped to his best bud’s house.
You were pulled deep into his throat and luckily (or unluckily) got stuck on a glob of sticky, slimy phlegm directly above his whitish pair of vocal cords. You could see the dark abyssal tunnel below, which lead to his lungs according to your 2nd grade anatomy knowledge. His breath was hot and smelly, and the creepy hollow sound each breathe made stroke fear into your childish mind. You couldn’t even move your fingers in the sticky mess of phlegm, left alone your body. Every time he spoke, his squeaky boyish voice boomed right next to your ears. That along with his continuous humming and his pounding heartbeats was like a long term torture to your poor vulnerable ears. At least his throat didn’t have the habit of spilling stinky acid on you, as well as creating mini earthquakes and smelly gas bubbles of deadly explosive burps. But still, it was hellish for you. “This is not going to end well! Absolutely not!”
Well, what would happen? Make your choice!
1441231111.title: Zephyrus is a cruel bastard!

14412311111.content:
It’d been 15 minutes since the moment you got trapped in Aaron’s throat. The humming of the boy was still as annoying as ever. “At least he had stop talking!” you said. You tried to move your arm again. But like the other 20 times before, you failed. His phlegm was just too sticky. You began to see yourself as those young foolish mammoth that got stuck in a tar pit, a tar pit made of disgusting saliva and snot. And that tar pit laid next to a gigantic volcano that kept spewing nothing but that annoying humming sound. Then suddenly, his pair of vocal cords stretched, and an extremely high pitch voice boomed right next to your ears. “WHAT THE HECK IS GOING ON OUT THERE!” you angrily shouted

“DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAVIDDDDDDDDDDD! HEY DAVID! COME HERE FAST! I GOT SOMETHING TO SHOW YOU! QUICKLY!” Aaron was standing in David’s well-cut front yard and screamed his friend’s name as loud as possible. He really wanted that Lego Castle set, and couldn’t wait any longer. He continued to scream for a while before the window on the second floor open, and David’s head poked out. “Hey Aaron! What with all those screaming! I have homework to do!” he asked, clearly show annoyance in his tone. “LOOK WHAT I”VE GOT FROM THOSE KIDS!” Aaron waved his hand holding the two cards he got. The windows were shut immediately, and in less than 10 seconds, the door sprung out, followed by an extremely excited David moving in supersonic speed. Between Aaron and him, David was the more serious one, the cool smart kid of the duo. But all of those coolness and seriousness instantly vanished every time he saw a rare Pokemon card. “HOW DID YOU GET THESE? THESE CARDS ARE LIKE THE SUPER RARE TYPE! GO TO MY ROOM! I WILL BRING MY COLLECTION OUT! I BOUGHT SOME CAKE THIS MORNING, TOO! HURRY! WE CAN EAT AND TALK ABOUT THIS!” David excitingly screamed while pushing Arron into his house. After having got Aaron to his room (and a 90 seconds of repeated “OMG”), David turn back to his serious self. “So, what do you want in exchange of those card?” David spoke like a true business man in an important trade. “Your Lego Castle. EVERY. SINGLE. PIECE. OF. IT.” Aaron answered, as firm as a rock. "HALF! And I will give you a bonus set of 10 knights and horses!” David responded. That Lego set was expensive, and he couldn’t risk a whole set just for 2 cards, no matter how rare they were. And so they argued for another 15 minutes, before Aaron gave up, and follow David’s deal. “Man! You are just like your father!” Aaron whined. “Well, isn’t that too obvious! Anyhow, let’s eat! These cake won’t last long outside the fridge.” David said and gave the disk holding a quarter of the cake to Aaron as a comforting gift. “Tha-ARGH!” Aaron sent his thanks, but was interrupted by a cough. He continued to cough for another 2 time the stop. “You okay dude?” asked David. “Nah! Just some dust in my throat! Thanks anyway! Now let’s eat! After this let’s play your new games!” Aaron said, before grabbing a big chunk of the cake with his bare hand and stuffed it in his mouth. ”Wow! This cake is really tasty! Thanks David!” Aaron cheerfully said and stuffed more cake in his mouth. “No problem! But seriously dude, you really need to fix your eating habit!” David said, before politely munching his cake with a coffee spoon.

You were pretty sure one of your ears was broken. “Darn it! This guy is annoying!” you angrily said. But anger couldn’t really help you now. You were still being stuck in his throat, with no ways to move your body and get out. Then a miracle happen. You could felt a weird rumbling sound in his throat. The vibration somehow helped loosen you prison of spit, and you could slowly move your body again (imagine a slow motion of a dung beetle wiggling it legs when it is flipped it on its back, that’s you). Looked like the phlegm had caused some irritation for his throat, and he was going to cough you out. “Finally!” you cheered. Having able to move your body again, you wiggled your body and made his throat more irritated. Then small bursts of wind flied came out, before a bigger one came, blasted both you and some of his phlegm out of his mouth. “YEEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSS! I’m free again!” you yelled, not knowing that you weren’t flying, but rather falling. Soon, you landed in some kind of weird white compound. “What is this? Wait, is this….whipped cream?” you wondered, having taste the weird compound. You struggle to stand up, as if you were in a swamp. Then everything became clear to you. You hadn’t been freed. You had landed on a cake. And in the sky were a gigantic pillar of flesh that was slowly descending. “Oh no! I’m not gonna be eaten again! Not this time!” you said and tried to move. But the whipped cream made that task nearly impossible for you, and in a few seconds, the chunk of cake you were on was lifted to the air, toward that familiar moon-sized face that would consume you. You was quickly throw into his mouth along with the cake. You tried to dodge his white pearly teeth and lashes of his tongue, while running toward his pink plumping lips- the gateway that lead to the outside world. But all your effort was futile, as the gigantic mass of muscle rose up against the roof of the cavernous mouth, before throwing you to the dark abyssal throat.

You were squeezed down the dark cramped esophagus by the peristalsis movement of the mighty muscle. Then the familiar sphincter opened, like the wide maw of a demon waiting to swallow you whole. You were discarded into his big stomach, filled with the white whipped cream. His stomach wasn’t as big as Alfred’s but stinkier and more active. For the second time in a day, you were thrown inside a boy’s stomach. For the second time in a day, you had to look at those horribly wrinkly walls. For the second time in a day, you were dunked inside disgusting stomach juice. “What could possibly be worse than this? May be I’ll survive, like I had when inside Alfred’s stomach!” you said, remembering about your invincibility. But your prediction was wrong. After hours of feeling nothing beside disgust and sleepiness, a burning pain on your left shoulder shook you. You quickly look at your shoulder, only to see a red patch of skin where the acid drop hit. “W-Wait! How can this happen? The last time I was fine! How? What’s wrong this time?” Then you looked at your left arm, and the truth shocked you. The skin was much paler. No, not like that. It was…returning into your original skin color. info.brief_description: You are having breakfast with you family and you shrink to micro size
info.description:
Your are Benjamin and you are 8 years old. One morning you, your dad, and your two brother went to a special Guys only breakfast at waffle house. You start to feel weird so you go to the restroom where you shrink down to micro size.


Characters:
Benjamin 8
Daniel 10
Ethan 5
Richard 32


Rules:
No interaction with females
No killing off the main character, he becomes immortal when he shrinks.
This is an unaware shrinking and vore store so please try to stick to those themes
No Feet that is not my forte
Nothing sexual however he can fall into underwear and come in contact with anything in them just make sure the person stays unaware of Benjamin.
Can come in contact with animals or anybody his brothers or dad is friends with
He may leave waffle house but must be unawarily taken from the restaurant but try not to let him be taken out too quickly.
Any question please let me know. If you read please help add. Thanks


Gift points will be given for good chapters.
